name: MOPEKS Text File
summary: Learn about .MTXT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When you open the MOPEKS application for the first time, a window will open asking if you want to make the MTXT file associated with the MOPEKS program, click Yes.
MTXT files are located in one of the class folders found in C:\​MOPEKS\​Library\​Problems User.
NOTE: Other MOPEKS associated files include .MPKT, .MSCT, and .MTHD.

description: Text file created by MOPEKS, a program that generates multiple programs run by its script to use each other to solve problems; contains trial problem data; when it's clicked, the application references the data to run a trial to solve the problem;
